channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I am trying to add into my server the mage which yells out when I am offline or online.
So far I have gotten the actual code correct but the only problem is I do not know where to put it. I have been told that it goes into the NPCHandler.java file and that much I know. But the only thing is, where do I slot it against the other commands?
Anyone please help?? :confused:

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Search for “Moo” In npchandler.java.

And click enter after the last “}”

and paste the code

Read full topic
